Object.name: Stick
Object.Description: A stick harvested from an oak tree. Seems to be of poor worksmanship.

Object.name: Rusty Iron Shortsword
Object.Description: A rusty iron shortsword. Blunted by forgone use and poor maintenance.

Object.name: Steel Shortsword
Object.Description: A common sword used by travelers and warriors alike. Made of hard steel, with few blemishes.

Object.name: Black Shortsword
Object.Description: A shortsword fabricated of out elysium metal. A rare remnant of the old esforge.

Object.name: Twintooth
Object.Description: A twin-tipped sword. Double tip, double... weight. There doesn't seem to be any practical use.

Object.name: Mezhier's Bane (Replicate)
Object.Description: Forged in the fashion of Mezhier's Bane. A fabled sword used to smite the ancient ruler.

Object.name: Sword of Luminous Glory
Object.Description: An extremely sharp blade. Blinds those who gaze into its shimmer. So don't look to clos—.

Object.name: Sword of Everlasting Gloom
Object.Description: A keen blade. Formed of precious gems and metals. Woefully named after a rather gloomy warrior.

Object.name: Sword of Marvelous Majesty
Object.Description: Immaculately fashioned and gleaming with a brilliant scarlet. Once used by ancient majesty, but lost with the fall of Mezhier.

Object.name: Sword of Unknown UT
Object.Description: A large and environmentally-friendly blade. Still has yet to discover its own name and description.

Object.name: Thumbor
Object.Description: Heroic Dumirians willingly sacrificed their souls to assist Balun in crafting his titan hammer, Thumbor.

Object.name: Sword of Dastardly Deed
Object.Description: Dazzling with with piercing reflection, the sword is a wicked wonder. Forged from forgotten depths to fulfill secluded services.

Object.name: Sword of Tier 10
Object.Description: A sword that is tier 10

Object.name: Worn out Claymore
Object.Description: An old and used claymore. Not much of what it used to be.

Object.name: Antique Claymore
Object.Description: A regular old claymore, saved by hoarders due to the metal scarcity. Never turned out to be worth much.

Object.name: Gold-Bladed Claymore
Object.Description: A fine gold-plated blade. Looks quite fashionable, don't damage the precious metal!

Object.name: Brawler's Bludgeoning Claymore
Object.Description: A large and obtrusely tipped claymore. A heavy hitter, but is exhausting to swing.

Object.name: Sage's Serpentine Blade
Object.Description: Swings unaturally and with a mystical nature. The recipe for it's creation are lost to the Esforge.

Object.name: Blacksteel Claymore
Object.Description: A steel claymore hardend by unknown elements. Presents with a matte-like color, but, upon further inspection, micro shards gleam in the light.

Object.name: Blade of the Viridian Behemoth
Object.Description: A blade saturated with viridian gems and materials. The climax of one's selection.

Object.name: Claymore of the Azure Leviathan
Object.Description: A blade of limited creation. Forged for the protection of utmost majesty.

Object.name: Claymore of the Chartreuse Colossus
Object.Description: A colossal blade. Sturdy and resiliant, sprouted from the genesis of Gaia.

Object.name: Mannah's Soul Crux
Object.Description: A blade infused with the souls of fallen warriors. Their essence is used to converge the blade's power to a point.

Object.name: Bothmur's Zweihander
Object.Description: Bothmur's Zweihander

Object.name: Claymore of Tier 9
Object.Description: A claymore that is tier 9.

Object.name: Claymore of Tier 10
Object.Description: A claymore that is tier 10

Object.name: Oak Longbow
Object.Description: A simple longbow. Constructed of wood extracted from an oak tree.

Object.name: Yew Longbow
Object.Description: The standard longbow. Used by rangers and apprentices alike.

Object.name: Osage Longbow
Object.Description: A fine longbow. Made with imported wood by an experienced craftsman.

Object.name: Fortified Longbow
Object.Description: A longbow of quality make. Its weakest points have been fortified with iron.

Object.name: Vulture's Ferocity
Object.Description: A bow splintered from a great Elm. Shoots arrows fashioned from vulture feathers.

Object.name: Arcus's Featherdraw Bow
Object.Description: Bow of agile construct. Fabricated to shoot swiftly, with high precision.

Object.name: Bow of Cruel Consequence
Object.Description: Accurate beyond belief. Provides severe consquences to those caught in its sight.

Object.name: Bow of Pitless Pestilence
Object.Description: Granted namesake for the bow's scourge upon its enemies. The never-ending arrows criple even the mightiest of foes.

Object.name: Bow of Renown Immortality
Object.Description: A master-class bow. The paragon of craftsmanship and skill. Fashioned out of gold and adorned with diamonds.

Object.name: Stormsong (Tehtman's Soulstring)
Object.Description: A bow of broad carnage. Alternating shots with the result of a widespread blow.

Object.name: Oda's Transcendent Longbow
Object.Description: Oda's Bow

Object.name: Ceremonial Bow
Object.Description: A ceremonial bow used by followers and acolytes of Rictorn.

Object.name: Bow of Tier 9
Object.Description: A bow that is tier 9.

Object.name: Bow of Tier 10
Object.Description: A bow that is tier 10.

Object.name: Spear
Object.Description: The standard fighting spear. Purchased for cheap, used by poor commoners.

Object.name: Double-Edged Spear
Object.Description: A spear tipped with a dual-sharpened blade. Causing damage from any direction!

Object.name: Ebonsteel Piercer
Object.Description: A pike forged with ebonsteel. A stalwart alloy that has triumphed the test of time.

Object.name: Bronze Piercer
Object.Description: A spear forged of bronze. Crafted with quick and old techniques.

Object.name: Enhanced Bronze Spear
Object.Description: Formed with modern mechanisms and technology. A reconstruction of an older spear design.

Object.name: Azler's Cerulean Partizan
Object.Description: A partizan of deep blue color. Razor sharp and of likeness to the famed original.

Object.name: Halberd of Redeeming Action
Object.Description: A halberd of disgraced infamy. Crawling towards redemption with every blow.

Object.name: Halberd of Habitual Misery
Object.Description: Gleams with an emerald green. A halberd that carves deep, causing lasting suffering.

Object.name: Halberd of Forsaken Blight
Object.Description: A deadly totem upon sight. Renowned for causing unspeakable calamity.

Object.name: Mannah's Mop
Object.Description: Used to clean the floor of Mannah's chambers. Emanates a tender magical hum...

Object.name: Halberd of Tier 9
Object.Description: A spear that is tier 9.

Object.name: Halberd of Tier 10
Object.Description: A spear that is tier 10.

Object.name: Student's Elixir
Object.Description: An elixir made by an inexperienced student. A foul fume lingers near the cork.

Object.name: Scholar's Elixir
Object.Description: An elixir formulated by a scholar of alchemy. Correctly measured and follows common practice.

Object.name: Elixir of the Elements
Object.Description: An elixir concocted from diverse elements. A balanced brew, inflicting damage upon touch.

Object.name: Elixir of Sorrow
Object.Description: A scarce elixir. Production of this elixir has ceased ever since its scientist vanished without a trace.

Object.name: Elixir of Phantoms
Object.Description: Brewed using an archaic formula, with each potion consuming a tremendous amount of time.

Object.name: Elixir of Empowerment
Object.Description: An elixir created to empower it's enemies to their swift annihilation.

Object.name: Elixir of Immolation
Object.Description: A foul-smelling elixir. Glows with a pink hue, and must be stored in a gold anointed vial.

Object.name: Elixir of Idle Minds
Object.Description: An elixir that can dull the sharpest of minds. One breath can make a man speechless for life.

Object.name: Elixir of Madness
Object.Description: An elixir that targets the neural. Even the elixir's architect is said to have gone mad.

Object.name: Elixir of Enigma
Object.Description: An astonishingly powerful elixir. Immensely unstable, and must be kept in small vials.

Object.name: Elixir of Tier 9
Object.Description: An elixir that is tier 9.

Object.name: Elixir of Tier 10
Object.Description: An elixir that is tier 10.

Object.name: Rusty Chainmail
Object.Description: Rusty chainmail that creaks with every small adjustment. It's better than nothing.. right?

Object.name: Steel Chainmail
Object.Description: Chainmail made out of steel. A standard warrior's armor that's useful in many situations.

Object.name: Wyvern Hide Chainmail
Object.Description: Trusty steel chainmail draped over a canvas of wyvern's hide.

Object.name: Gold Trimmed Armor
Object.Description: Steel plate armor that has been trimmed with gold. The style points alone should net an advantage.

Object.name: Warlord's Plate Armor
Object.Description: Plate armor worn by warlords. Fur surrounds the collar to provide protection and warmth.

Object.name: Bronze Plate Armor
Object.Description: Plate armor made out of full bronze. Provides full converage with minimal weak points.

Object.name: Armor of the Moonlight Guardian
Object.Description: Ebonsteel plate armor. Historically worn by a group of night guardians.

Object.name: Armor of Condemned Honor
Object.Description: Plate armor given its namesake from a mythical paladin who was never lacking honor. A fiery red cape drapes from it's collar.

Object.name: Armor of Lost Veneance
Object.Description: Plate armor made out of reinforced gold. Equipped with a magus cloak that is functional and fashionable.

Object.name: Valdok's Impervious Aegis
Object.Description: Plate armor forged from ebonsteel and augmented by Valdok's forge, provides the authorative defense of Valdok.

Object.name: Worn Leather Armor
Object.Description: Old and worn leather armor protection. A simple cloth lies underneath.

Object.name: Boiled Leather Armor
Object.Description: Standard leather armor that been boiled to increase strength and resistance.

Object.name: Bearhide Leather Armor
Object.Description: Leather armor fashioned out of a bear hide. The thick leather is difficult to penetrate.

Object.name: Minotaur Leather Armor
Object.Description: Leather armor crafted from a minotaur. Lightweight and durable.

Object.name: Ranger's Stealth Armor
Object.Description: Armor used by rangers and all manners of stealth archtypes. The armor's movement makes near to no sound.

Object.name: Gold-studded Armor
Object.Description: Leather armor studden with gold metal. What is gained in strength is also gained in weight.

Object.name: Dragonscale Body Armor
Object.Description: Extremely durable and resilient to damage. Crafted from the hide of a greenscale dragon.

Object.name: Tarrasque Body Armor
Object.Description: Fashioned from the hide of a tarrasque. The impenetrable hide makes this armor only vulterable at weak points.

Object.name: Kraken Body Armor
Object.Description: Hide armor created from the flesh of the kraken. Ancient sailors managed to cleverly remove a single tentacle.

Object.name: Empyrean's Guard
Object.Description: A light body armor constructed out of the corpse of an empyrean; a legendary creature that only materializes once every century.

Object.name: Robe of the Initiate
Object.Description: A robe made of simple materials. Worn by initiates of the order.

Object.name: Robe of the Learner
Object.Description: A robe worn by second-year members. Observed to be produced with quality materials.

Object.name: Robe of the Novice
Object.Description: A robe woven with rare silk. Worn by adept members.

Object.name: Robe of the Proselyte
Object.Description: A robe of superior silk. Bears the symbol of the high order.

Object.name: Robe of the Convert
Object.Description: Fashioned with elegant silk and vibrant orange drapes.

Object.name: Robe of the Cultist
Object.Description: A robe of exquisite material and make. Worn by the leaders of the high order.

Object.name: Robe of Opaque Enlightenment
Object.Description: A robe of magnificent, almost magical, build. First robe of three to transcend the high order.

Object.name: Robe of Calamitous Demise
Object.Description: A malefactor's robe, worn by those who desire calamity and destruction.

Object.name: Robe of Arcane Mastery
Object.Description: A robe of supreme aspect. Clouded with whispers of its magical make.

Object.name: Archmage's Sibylline Vestment
Object.Description: A dazzling garment imbued with mystifying hues. Strange symbols coat the robe in a chaotic, but seemingly ordered, way.

Object.name: Ring of Speed
Object.Description: An emerald fixed on top of a silver ring.

Object.name: Ring of Attack
Object.Description: An amethyst fixed on top of a silver ring.

Object.name: Ring of Defense
Object.Description: An obsidian crystal fixed on top of a silver ring.

Object.name: Ring of Vigor
Object.Description: A ruby fixed on top of a silver ring.

Object.name: Ring of Significant Speed
Object.Description: A sizable emerald fixed on top of a silver ring.

Object.name: Ring of Significant Attack
Object.Description: A sizable amethyst fixed on top of a silver ring.

Object.name: Ring of Significant Defense
Object.Description: A sizable obsidian crystal fixed on top of a silver ring.

Object.name: Ring of Significant Vigor
Object.Description: A sizable ruby fixed on top of a silver ring.

Object.name: Ring of Acclaimed Speed
Object.Description: An immense emerald fixed on top of a gold ring.

Object.name: Ring of Acclaimed Attack
Object.Description: An immense amethyst fixed on top of a gold ring.

Object.name: Ring of Acclaimed Defense
Object.Description: An immense obsidian crystal fixed on top of a gold ring.

Object.name: Ring of Acclaimed Vigor
Object.Description: An immense ruby fixed on top of a gold ring.

Object.name: Ring of Monumental Speed
Object.Description: A tremendous emerald fixed on top of a gleaming gold ring.

Object.name: Ring of Monumental Attack
Object.Description: A tremendous amethyst fixed on top of a gleaming gold ring.

Object.name: Ring of Monumental Defense
Object.Description: A tremendous obsidian crystal fixed on top of a gleaming gold ring.

Object.name: Ring of Monumental Vigor
Object.Description: A tremendous ruby fixed on top of a gleaming gold ring.

Object.name: Ring of the Lonely Spirit
Object.Description: A ring affixed with a jewel trinity. Rumored to benefit all aspects of life.

Object.name: Adorned Band
Object.Description: A gold band engulfed with luscious emeralds.

Object.name: Ring of Sinful Beauty
Object.Description: A brilliant platinum ring adorned with a grand, diamond-shaped, ruby.

Object.name: Ring of Stalwart Vitality
Object.Description: A hefty and brawny stone affixed on a platinum band.

Object.name: Mezhier's Ring of Valor
Object.Description: A ring worn by valorant warriors. Said to possess the spirit of Mezhier.

Object.name: Tehtman's Brutal Band
Object.Description: A blazing amber placed upon a bronze band.

Object.name: Arcus's Nimble Circlet
Object.Description: A magnificent emerald placed upon a bronze band.

Object.name: Mannah's Capstone
Object.Description: A dazzling gold ring. A pristine amethyst crowns the band and is enveloped in gold leaves.

Object.name: Ring of Colossal Speed
Object.Description: A colossal emerald fixed on top of an enchanted gemmed ring.

Object.name: Ring of Colossal Attack
Object.Description: A colossal amethyst fixed on top of an enchanted gemmed ring.

Object.name: Ring of Colossal Defense
Object.Description: A colossal obsidian crystal fixed on top of an enchanted gemmed ring.

Object.name: Ring of Colossal Vigor
Object.Description: A colossal ruby fixed on top of an enchanted gemmed ring.

Object.name: Juix
Object.Description: Uhh.. what do I do with this.

Object.name: Scroll of Agility
Object.Description: A delicate scroll, its contents dimly hum with a soft leafy color.

Object.name: Scroll of Power
Object.Description: A scroll of unstable constitution. Radiates of erratic nature.

Object.name: Scroll of Fortitude
Object.Description: A scroll enfused with stone and iron. A sturdy ambience resinates from its core.

Object.name: Scroll of Stamina
Object.Description: A scroll permeating with hope. A lively essence seems to spring from the paper.

Object.name: Health Vial
Object.Description: Concocted for the purpose of rejuvenation, but deadly in large quantities.

Object.name: Healing Spell
Object.Description: A widely used healing spell. Carried by all adventurers to handle tricky situations.

Object.name: Beginner's Pack
Object.Description:
A suitable package to start the game with a head start! Start playing another character today!
1x Character Slot 12x Vault Slots

Object.name: Soulless Ring
Object.Description: Soulless Ring

Object.name: Robe of Soulless Rejuvenation
Object.Description:
A robe woven from soul strands that emit an ambient glow.
This item heals its user for 10% missing health every 5 seconds.

Object.name: Soulless Heavy Armor
Object.Description:
Armor forged of heavy gold and embued with gathered essence.
This item heals its user for 10% missing health every 5 seconds.

Object.name: Soulless Light Armor
Object.Description:
Soulless Light Armor
This item heals its user for 10% missing health every 5 seconds.

Object.name: F Emote
Object.Description: Unlocks the 'F' emote

Object.name: Heart Emote
Object.Description: Unlocks the 'Heart' emote

Object.name: Danger Emote
Object.Description: Unlocks the 'Danger' emote

Object.name: Thumbs Up Emote
Object.Description: Unlocks the 'Thumbs Up' emote

Object.name: Rare Chest Emote
Object.Description: Unlocks the 'Rare Chest' emote
